title: Online Personality And Career Testing Website
text: Questions Business Summary A new trend has changed the traditional resume/interview recruitment process. More and more businesses are using personality assessment tests as tools to sort through candidates. According to the Wall Street Journal, over 80% of midsize and large companies use personality and ability assessments for entry and midlevel positions. The benefits of finding the right fit for the job can be critical to reducing turnover costs required to recruit and train each professional (typically estimated at one year's salary). The site offers a range of online personality and career tests. In addition to the Myers-Briggs Career and Interpretive Report options, the range of online assessment and personality testing packages includes reports and testing in several foreign languages as well. Also offered are testing for mid-career professionals making a job switch, career college profile reports and much more! Its customers range from individuals and groups to small businesses and major corporations. With no physical inventory to manage, this website business is run from a home based office, is easily relocateable and can be operated from any location with internet access. The website is successfully operated by one owner working part-time about 24 hours per week on the phone with clients and about 10 hours per week handling administrative duties. The business is trending upward with Sales and Profits for Jan-July 2015 up 21% and 27% respectively over the same period in 2014! As current revenues and profits are generated with minimal marketing, there is a great opportunity for a new owner to readily grow the business by increasing marketing efforts. The owner must be considered educationally eligible by the primary test supplier by holding a master's or doctoral degree in psychology or a related field and/or by holding a specific state license or national or state certification the specifics of which are referenced in the prospectus.
